website_summaries.verdict: The best drone accessory since it will keep your drone protected from damage when not in use.
pros: The large bag features a spacious interior that can accommodate most small quad-rotor drone designs
Additional spaces include accessory pockets for controllers, batteries, and more
cons: Soft bag does not offer the same impact protection as a hard shell protection

customer_reviews.title: A perfect vessel for my drone
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and perfect fit of my Phantom 3 Advanced drone, along with 2 spare batteries and the controller, along with a spare set of props and other small auxiliary items. Can also easily slide my ipad into one of the outside pockets for easy transport. The backpack feature makes it easy to haul it around once I arrive at the site. Have not yet packed it into my suitcase for any of my travels, but it seems as if it will fit into a large suitcase..........but certainly not in my carry on luggage : )
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for the price paid. I am very pleased ased
customer_reviews.text: This pack was about $10 cheaper than some very similar ones, however it was out of stock for a while. I almost ordered a different pack but then in came back in to stock and for the price it was worth it. One it arrived very quickly I put my drone remote and batteries as well as some tools and other accessories all comfortably in this case. Plenty of room and very secure. Great product for the price. Take note YOU WILL NEED TO TAKE THE BLADES OFF OF THE DRONE TO FIT IN THIS CASE.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this bag
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this bag. It's very nice. Fits every needed accessory. If you end up buying a bunch of accessories, you'll need something bigger. Mine fits the drone (props off), 8 props, a charger, two batteries (three if you set one under the drone), controller (plus range extender), a small box for memory cars and readers, and the prop protectors in the outside zipper pocket. Like I said, great for typical drone stuff. Once you add a bigger range extending antenna, iPad holder, more batteries, sun shade, laptop.... you'll need another bag. I have an phantom 3 standard. This product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony BC83

customer_reviews.title: This case is wonderful for my husbands droid
customer_reviews.text: This case is wonderful for my husbands droid. It arrived earlier than expected. It is a nice durable case. It can we worn on the back like a backpack, which is OK. It is comfortable as it can be to carry on your back. Straps offer good padding. Good quality well made. It has lots of little areas to add some extra parts and pieces to take with you/store as well. I am glad I purchased this case. We are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Jones

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Phantom drone owners
customer_reviews.text: I found the backpack to be incredibly useful, as it gives my Phantom 3 some of the convenient portability of a smaller drone like the Mavic. It holds my Phantom 3 Standard and all accessories snugly; there is room for my drone, spare props, controller, battery charger, two batteries, a folding landing pad, and all the appropriate FAA paperwork. This is a must-have because you NEED something to secure this drone when you are moving it around, and I would highly recommend not using the box it came in, unless you'd like your drone to be stolen!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Better than the giant case I was using!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I had a very large case that I could carry my drone in but some of the locations that I photograph and film are somewhat remote so I have to walk to some of them. This is much better than carrying a big briefcase looking case. I'm not a fan of having to take the props off and back on but it's understable for the size of the backpack. Much more comfortable and compact.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend (P3 4k)
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for my Phantom 3 4k and controller. I even have the motor covers, extra set of blades and tablet for the controller that all fit easily. The case is made well with a perfectly formed rigid foam interior that fits the unit perfectly to prevent any damage in storage or carrying. This is a really good product, especially for the money, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JTAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Required Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit ! Drone fits snug, as do the controller, 2 extra batteries, 8 blades and the charger. Outside pocket fits a landing disc, tablet and harness. It's comfortable and the weight is distributed evenly. Only issue; my tablet attachment on the controller is a tad too tall. It zips closed, but it's tight. My problem, not the manufacturer's.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: It only fits two batteries like the picture shows but it was difficult to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed room for 3 batteries and an extra set of propellers. It only fits two batteries like the picture shows but it was difficult to get an extra set of propellers in it. I was hoping I could also fit my battery charging station instead of the single plug in charger but it barely fits. Trying to do that made the zippers mess up. If you're packing 1 drone, 2 batteries, 1 controller, 1 set of propellers, it is nice. If you need room to pack a few extras you'll need to purchase another bag on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Anton J. Thery

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Nice case with enough room for all your gear. Can be easily modified to hold extra little tools etc. The zipper on mine was problematic since new. Seller contacted me immediately and resolved the problem. Great customer service. Highly recommend the case for protection and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: JustBill

customer_reviews.title: NOT what is advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay for what it is, a drone bag, it gets the job done keeping it protected. BUT it doesn't look like photo with the metal handle, the handle is just a regular handle.
customer_reviews.author: Zuliet

customer_reviews.title: D- If you don’t mind breaking your antenna get it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed this barely fit my P3S and I feel like the antenna could break once it’s all zipped up. Returning this back.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: A normal backpack for DJI drone, foams inside the bag protects the drone well. The size is perfect for the phantom series. However, the quality doesn’t fit it’s price.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag! So much less expensive of same one that I found at Best Buy! Securely packs Drone with no worries when carrying or traveling. I highly recommend this bag!! ($150 less)
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little case for my Phantom 3. It holds my drone nice and snug, keeping it protected, and has ample storage for 2 extra batteries, the controller and whatever other misc. items I may want to take with me on a flight outing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag. I have the Phantom 3 standard and it fits all of the components very well, including some room for extra things. I had to re-order this bag because the zipper on my first bag was off. They replaced it right away and the second bag was all good. I really like how light this bag is and that it wears like a backpack very easily.
customer_reviews.author: MMRu

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterproof Carrying Case!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time, packaged securely and ready to use. I was on my way to the Dominican Republic to get some photo's and I needed an easy to carry backpack, for my DJI Phantom 3 Standard. The carrying case is light and easy to carry. My seven-year-old daughter had no problem hauling this around. Thank you Powerextra!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! I know there are other products that may be better but for the price this one offers you can't beat it. You do have to take a few things apart on your drone to fully close it, which is probably the safest thing to do anyways. The foam inserts aren't perfect but they still work fine for my DJI.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Works good for HS700D.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to carry a Holy Stone 700D. All the equipment fits in it. Nice and sturdy. Good piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: DBJ

customer_reviews.title: I am sure there are better cases on the market but this works ok for ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to modify it to fit the Standard 3. Not everything fit correctly without mods. I am sure there are better cases on the market but this works ok for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very Popular on TouTube
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag for about 3 weeks ago. I would buy again given how light it is and how easily your Phantom 3 will fit inside with all the accessories. I thought about a hard shell, but way too heavy and expensive. This is perfect for the price and ease of use and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Mako

customer_reviews.title: I like the case everything fits pretty tight I have the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the case everything fits pretty tight I have the DJI Standard. I gave it a four star because some of the padding inside, separated and I had to glue it back but its as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: JHunter

customer_reviews.title: cheap and does its job
customer_reviews.text: great price and serves its purpose. it is not fancy and not super durable but a huge improvement over the original packaging box I was using. Glad I bought it and didn't spent the extra bucks for the other options
customer_reviews.author: marcin

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: Really good and reliable at good price, I am not giving the 5 stars because you need to do some modification in order to my control to fit, but it is just minimal, the backpack style is just awesome and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Esmaylor Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for DJI Phantom Standard Drone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the DJI Phantom Standard drone. Fits all accessories. Arrived as advertised and on time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Could use another pocket or 2 but it's certainly a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: RCP

customer_reviews.title: Okay case
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. I paid too much. There are better cases out there. I am not completely happy with the foam interior; it looks like it was put together quickly and the halves do not line up well.
customer_reviews.author: bojopo

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price; must have to protect your drone
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is nice, but have not tried to subject it to water. The items fit good inside, and it's were I store my drone and its components. The only thing I don't like doing is take the props off every time I want to store it. I have since gotten use to it and know it's a necessary evil.
customer_reviews.author: MarlowP

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad deal for a case
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad deal for a case. It feels like it's relatively universal but holds my DJI Phantom 3 Advanced pretty well. Wish there was a better storage option for the props instead of sticking them down at an angle around the aircraft.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for phantom drones
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for phantom drones. Holds everything you need, such as, drone, controller, propellers, charger, and two batteries. The front pocket is pretty tight, so don't expect to fit anything big in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: Right for phantom 3
customer_reviews.text: the drone fit well. can add the caps to cover the motors
customer_reviews.author: Wayne McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I do wish it had a spot for the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Poncho Elder

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Case is OK, However the only problem that I see is that the Remote control antenna does not fit properly, causing a small presure on the antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for the value and good protection for my deone
customer_reviews.author: DIEGO V.

customer_reviews.title: Simple prefect
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to transport and travel with my drone
customer_reviews.author: Niostt

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose. Price is right!
customer_reviews.text: It serves the purpose. I will not have a need for the questionable warerproofness. I put the propellers in the zippered front pocket. Everything fits properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dean in NC

customer_reviews.title: Drone Home
customer_reviews.text: Handles the Phantom 3 Advanced quite nicely. Wish I didn't have to remove the blades, but it's not really any difficulty. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, lots of room and your stuff stays dry!
customer_reviews.text: NicEly made..and I'm so glad it's waterproof! Got stuck in the rain, and it worked great. My Droid and equipment stayed nice and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Kari S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect simplistic case to use when traveling. I have also used it as a tripod for my camera and have used it to hold other things along with my drone. For the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: celeste call

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. It has plenty of space, it's light weight the only thing I don't like is the remote sticks out more than it should but for this price I can leave with it.
customer_reviews.author: leonardo ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works ok , P3se does not fit well but for the price its not bad
customer_reviews.author: emt328184

customer_reviews.title: got this as a gift for my dad. he ...
customer_reviews.text: got this as a gift for my dad. he loves it! it holds all his accessories and makes it way easier to travel with his drone!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: and the controler location could of been worked better, its pushing against the front pading which has ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 main issues, I wish I could close it while the propellers are connected, and the controler location could of been worked better, its pushing against the front pading which has already dented.
customer_reviews.author: May Madriaga

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price. Would of given it a 5 star if the remote fit. The antenna touches the top of the bag and applies a little pressure on it. Thats all.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! Excellent price and holds everything I need when going to fly my drone. No complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, fits my dji Phantom 3 Standard like a glove. If you have the attachment for your ipad the controller will not fit
customer_reviews.author: blkphotography

customer_reviews.title: DJI Drone bag for carrying everything except the AC poor source
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for your DJI Drone. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: highlander

customer_reviews.title: Good protective bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag Quadcopter fits very nicely with accessories and price was right would recommend if looking for P3 standard bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gissa1

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: great bad for the DJI phantom, Holds all of the things needed to fly.
customer_reviews.author: Jack's Place

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just received a second bag. This one appears well made. I have no complaints. Happy that the issue was resolved.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MUELLER

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory - One Strap Started Pulling Away Though
customer_reviews.text: About what you'd expect for a $45 case but one of the straps on mine started to separate from the bag! So I returned it. No problems with the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bravern

customer_reviews.title: No complaint. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits well in the case. I'm very well pleased. Next step is to purchase folding CF props. That will save more time than one realizes.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Bag size - Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the size of the bag because it seemed large but holds everything perfect and is very lightweight. Love the protection it provides. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it will take the test of time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits if you’re strategic in placement, easy way to carry drone around safely.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit everything perfectly. Design could use a little work but functions well and serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, didnt test the waterproofness of it but the compartments were good.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Decent case for phantom 3 pro with limited ammount of ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent case for phantom 3 pro with limited ammount of storage space,, also this product claims to be waterproof but It is not
customer_reviews.author: Bryce D.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Phantom 3 Standard
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a Phantom 3 Standard. The controller is too tall, even if the phone holder is removed. Do not buy if you're looking for a bag to carry this model.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M.

customer_reviews.title: it would be great.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the phantom 3 standard but there's not much room for the antenna on the standard remote. I'm a little worried it might break. If that wasn't an issue, it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Zipper issue
customer_reviews.text: The case layout and feel is good however the zipper started to fail almost immediately. Better zipper would make this case a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality drone case
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit snug and perfectly ...The only issue is that wish it had a few more storage pockets...
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Goode

customer_reviews.title: Probably should return unit
customer_reviews.text: Product shows up. Battery cannot be charged or used, have no idea if this unit is actually operational, and DJI Phantom does not return emails
customer_reviews.author: Sorry I bought

customer_reviews.title: Low cost alternative to the other bags.
customer_reviews.text: The cutouts are not completely right for all of the parts of the Phantom 3 Professional. But, the price is good!
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The case holds up well. It seems to need a little more room for the remote's antenna.
customer_reviews.author: robinsdomain

customer_reviews.title: and the product is of great quality. Bought this for my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was timely, and the product is of great quality. Bought this for my boyfriend, who takes drone videos and pictures for homes. He's so thrilled to have a sturdy, stylish case for his drone, which he can carry with him for client meetings. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alena Kangas

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient but protective
customer_reviews.text: It’s good to store the drone in but you have to assemble and disassemble each time you want to store it or use it. Not as convenient as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: DJI phantom 3 standart and case Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product.I am using it with phantom 3 standard and it fit perfectly.controller fits great, has 2 spaces for batteries and some extra packets for charger and other stuff.great quality fast shipping definitely awesome product for price
customer_reviews.author: Denis Koup on AIr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for DJI Phantom 3 STD. Must remove props before closing, but very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great first drone backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to insert drone and carry around. I do wish that the charging pocket would be a bit bigger since I do find myself shoving it in there.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied with my purchase. Fit my phantom 3 pro with no problems. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great - just what I needed for my Drone stuff! Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Radzat

customer_reviews.title: A must when buying a higher end drone ~ perfect to use as a back pack to ensure that ...
customer_reviews.text: A must when buying a higher end drone ~ perfect to use as a back pack to ensure that everything is "together" and safe...MOST DEFINITELY recommend this "back pack/case"!!!
customer_reviews.author: CBB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for starting out unless you need the hard case for rougher transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lachendro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag for the money. Everything fits perfectly and is well protected while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: HConnolly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Prefect to fort my needs and just the right size to carry on the plane

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bag but the controller doesn't fit well. T chrome bracelet for a phone sticks out
customer_reviews.author: SLOliver

customer_reviews.title: Case is well padded and very light.
customer_reviews.text: Backpack fitted my Phantom 3 4K drone perfectly. Case is well padded and very light. I strongly recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars!! A must have! Excellent quality. No issues 6 months after purchase
customer_reviews.author: Waylon Backer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. A place for everything plus additional accessories..
customer_reviews.author: Dicko

customer_reviews.title: Drone case
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect storage case. A little bulky for a backpack but overall just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery lover

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the economical buyer
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for the economical buyer...It's not the best bag but its probably the best for the money...It's definitely worth the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford H.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was fast. So far I can get my ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. So far I can get my drone , battery ,my propellers and a few small other things In the case.. There's a slot for my remote control and it fits but not without having to kinda force it .. would to make the slot just a little bigger... Other than that I have no complaints..
customer_reviews.author: artemis

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just got this it fits everything my phantom 3 standard comes with and even more I would nightly recommend this it's light weight and feels comfortable this will be one of my carry ons when I leave for Wyoming day after tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Seely

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The case is not waterproof but water resistant. The zippers nor the fabric are designed to keep water out. There is enough foam that the case that it will easily float the case fully loaded. The exerior pocket on the cover of my case was not sewn in correctly. I'm not sure it can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My phantom 3 advanced fits in perfectly. Enough room for extra parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it, it can fit my Phantom 3 Standard, the argtech mod controller, the antennas on the pockets, everything looks great. Feels nice on the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Granco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its really good bag for my DJI Phamtom 3 love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protection of your drone and for easy carrying
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for protection of your drone and for easy carrying. Got these for international use, and they're perfect as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: DACopela

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great product case in good easy to store all my stuff and drone
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, but standard remote control does not fit.
customer_reviews.text: Decent protection for the Phantom 3 Standard, but the standard remote controller does not fit as advertised. I will have to trim the foam padding around the controller if I decide to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Simple Case for the Phantom 3 Series Quad
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does the job. I am able to carry the drone with a battery in it, as well as two extra batteries, transmitter, props and extras. I like that it allows me to carry it like a suitcase or use it as a backpack. The foam inside of it is not soft but rigid. It also has a external pocket that I use to carry misc items and my Android Tablet in. It is water resistant and works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: ESSENTIAL
customer_reviews.text: Great case essential to keep your very expensive drone safe and very comfortable to carry on your back and easy to bring on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Pizzuto

customer_reviews.title: All together happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Tons of storage, fits in alright. All together happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great storage for your drone. My husband loves this to keep all his drone stuff in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A stable good organized backpack for my UPair ONE when i make my next transatlantic flight.
customer_reviews.author: Kyburz Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, a little too bulky for me.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, nothing wrong with the bag itself. Product is described correctly and works great! Loses points on how bulky it is for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Al Nooh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband was really happy with this backpack, the quality was great. Shipping was super fast
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the Phantom 3 advanced perfectly. The rigid foam inside protects the drone very well. Plenty of room for the drone, 2 batteries, the controller, and the charger. Also there is a pocket on the top of the case that fits my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Goofy1148

customer_reviews.title: Well it's nothing to write home about but not horrible either. I definitely wouldn't call it "waterproof" maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: Well it's nothing to write home about but not horrible either. I definitely wouldn't call it "waterproof" maybe the material is but zippers definitely aren't. I had to cut on the foam to get the controller to fit and the drone fits a little losely I wouldn't recommend alot of jolting if your carrying on your back. Overall it's a mediocre carrying case at best, it'll do ita job after a little modification and you don't bounce it around too hard. Have a phantom 3 standard by the way so maybe a advanced or pro fit better without modifications but for standard you will have to.
customer_reviews.author: Clark D. Hewitt

product_meta.title: Powerextra Waterproof Carrying Bag Cases Traveling Backpack for DJI 3 Professional, Advanced, Standard, 4K Quadcopter Drone and Accessories - Upgraded
feature_bullets: Double EVA protect, give your phantom the best protection and enjoy yourself.
Fits DJI 3 Professional, Advanced, Standard, 4K Quadcopter Drone and accessories.
Lighter, more practical, more suitable for your outdoor sports. Easy to carry your DJI Phantom drone and spare accessories.
Side pockets and back pockets can store other things such as ipad, smartphone and so on.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars350 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
